headline: DeSantis slams WHCA and calls Trevor Noah's claim about him during dinner a 'lie'
author: Ronn Blitzer
sentences: During another joke in which he compared DeSantis to former President Donald Trump, Noah again turned in the same direction and, as if speaking directly to DeSantis, said, "Youre smarter than him, youre slicker than him, you can walk down ramps."

DeSantis went on to slam the White House Correspondents Association (WHCA) as a whole for "saying how important they are, that they are somehow these paragons of truth, and yet there they are lying about something that is readily verifiable."

Ron DeSantis said Monday that despite repeated comments by Trevor Noah during the White House Correspondents Dinner Saturday night in which the comedian said DeSantis was in attendance, this was a "lie" and he had no interest in the event.

Noah made several jokes at DeSantiss expense during his performance, saying at one point that "Ron DeSantis is here," and looking into the audience as if he was directing his attention at the governor himself.

BIDEN RETURNS TO WHITE HOUSE CORRESPONDENTS DINNER  HERE ARE THE PITFALLS OF PRESIDENTIAL HUMOR
Noahs jokes about DeSantis began with one about his rumored presidential aspirations.
"I did not watch it, I dont care what they do, but for them to advertise me when that invitation was rejected by my office, that is a lie."
"The idea that I would have ever gone is false, and why they would want to try to perpetuate a lie about that, I dont know," he said.
Oh man, Im actually surprised that he found the time," Noah said while pointing into the crowd, as if in the governors direction.
"But I think it just shows you why that cabal of people in D.C., New York are so reviled by so many Americans.
I have no interest in that," DeSantis said, when asked about Noahs comments during a Monday news conference.
Following another joke about DeSantis, Noah again pointed in the same direction and said, "I see you, Ron."
After yet another joke about DeSantis, Noah again pointed in the same direction and said, "My man!"
"You know hes been so busy trying to outmaneuver Trump for 2024.
DeSantis blasted the WHCA for going along with this.
I think its a reputation thats been well deserved."
"One of my favorites, Ron DeSantis is here.
"I would never attend that.
I see you, player."
I see you Ron.
Florida Gov.
